name: A Madea Christmas
description: Madea dispenses her unique form of holiday spirit on a rural town when she's coaxed into helping a friend pay her daughter a surprise visit in the country for Christmas.

review.author: maxsideburn
review.heading: One of the funniest entries, but WOW the editing mistakes!
review.reviewBody: It's probably one of the funniest Madea movies, but there are literally scenes completely out of order and one scene even REPEATS. Don't know who edited but man did they drop the ball on it.

keywords: 2010s,christmas tree,family christmas,family farm,reference to growing corn
